data.displayName: Business LV TOU kVA demand + CL -14% off supply & usage

fees.description: Disconnection fee - applicable when energy is disconnected to the property.
Reconnection fee - applicable when energy is reconnected to the property.
Special meter read (including moving in and moving out of your supply address).
Late Payment Fee (GST is not applicable).
Direct Debit Rejection Fee (GST is not applicable).
Payment processing fee may apply to payments made by credit card (GST inclusive).
Payment processing fee may apply to payments made by debit card (GST inclusive).

electricityContract.terms: A copy of the Market Retail Contract is provided and can be seen on our website. Refer to https://www.actewagl.com.au/legal/pricing-information/your-rights-and-obligations.

discounts.description: All customers will receive a 14% discount off their electricity supply and usage charges, applied to each monthly electricity invoice for a benefit period of 12 months. Discount does not apply to any Greenchoice electricity charges, or miscellaneous fees and charges; and will not apply to any government taxes, fees, levies or charges. For further information, refer to https://www.actewagl.com.au/NSW-Standard-electricity-prices-July-2025.
discounts.displayName: Discount off supply and usage charges

electricityContract.variation: If we vary our market offer prices including your rates, fees, feed-in tariff or charges, we will notify you at least five business days before the variation in the tariffs and charges are to apply to you; and deliver the notice by your preferred form of communication where you have communicated this to us, or otherwise by the same method as that used for delivery of your bill.

eligibility.description: This offer is for new ActewAGL customers only.
Plan only available via retailer website sign-up.

demandCharges.description: A charge per month for the maximum half hourly demand between 5pm and 8pm on weekdays in a calendar month (or part thereof) in a billing period.
A charge per month for the maximum half hourly demand between 7am and 5pm on weekdays in a calendar month (or part thereof) in a billing period.
A charge per month for the maximum half hourly demand between 8pm and 10pm on weekdays in a calendar month (or part thereof) in a billing period.
A charge per month for the maximum half hourly demand between 10pm and 7am on weekdays in a calendar month (or part thereof) in a billing period.
A charge per month for the maximum half hourly demand on weekends in a calendar month (or part thereof) in a billing period.

timeOfUseRates.description: From 7am to 5pm and 8pm to 10pm on weekdays

singleRate.description: For 5 to 9 hours overnight on weekdays and extra hours on weekends
For 10 to 18 hours per day on weekdays and extra hours on weekends

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: The benefit period is 1 year. At the end of your benefit period you may be placed on a new pricing plan. We will notify you of any changes at least 20 business days before they take effect.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: For information on additional fees, refer to https://www.actewagl.com.au/legal/pricing-information/charges-and-rates.
